nodes.documentation: Define interface for releasing the token transfer after a successful crowdsale.
nodes.name: ReleasableToken

nodes.documentation: Limit token transfer until the crowdsale is over.
nodes.name: canTransfer

nodes.documentation: The function can be called only before or after the tokens have been releasesd
nodes.name: inReleaseState

nodes.documentation: The function can be called only by a whitelisted release agent.
nodes.name: onlyReleaseAgent

nodes.documentation:
Set the contract that can call release and make the token transferable.
Design choice. Allow reset the release agent to fix fat finger mistakes.
nodes.name: setReleaseAgent

nodes.documentation: Owner can allow a particular address (a crowdsale contract) to transfer tokens despite the lock up period.
nodes.name: setTransferAgent

nodes.documentation:
One way function to release the tokens to the wild.
Can be called only from the release agent that is the final ICO contract. It is only called if the crowdsale has been success (first milestone reached).
nodes.name: releaseTokenTransfer
